alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Georgetown and south central Horry Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burgess, or near Garden City, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surfside Beach, Garden City, Socastee, Murrells Inlet and Burgess. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry
